structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
CITY-COUNTY METROPOLITAN SEWER, SEWER CONSTRUCTION, AND SANITATION DISTRICTS

law.catch_line: Use of authority and procedures granted municipalities -- Terms in KRS Chapter 107 defined.
law.text: Any metropolitan sewer district created in the manner provided in this chapter may, if the board of such district deems it advisable, use the authority and procedures granted to incorporated municipalities by KRS 107.010 to 107.220. When applied to metropolitan sewer districts, terms used in KRS 107.010 to 107.220 shall be construed to mean the following: "city" or "municipality" means "metropolitan sewer district" (except that in KRS 107.090(1)(d), 107.130, 107.140(2)(a) and (c), and 107.150 referring to city taxes the term "city" shall continue to mean "city"); "ordinance" means "resolution"; "clerk" means "secretary of the metropolitan sewer district"; and "mayor or chairman of the board of directors" means "chairman of board of the metropolitan sewer district."
law.history: Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 331, sec. 20, effective July 15, 1986. --Created 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 13, sec. 2.
